name: mjpeg-camera-streamer
description: Simple MJPEG camera streamer for OctoPrint on Windows

scripts.build: pkg app.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/mjpeg-streamer.exe && pkg detect-cameras.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/detect-cameras.exe && pkg check-camera-caps.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/check-camera-caps.exe
